features: GENTLE FOAMING VAGINAL WASH FOR SENSITIVE SKIN - Made with natural, plant-based ingredients like Eucalyptus Leaf extract and Clove Flower extract to safely cleanse the most intimate parts of woman’s body.
SPECIALLY FORMULATED FOR PH BALANCE - Maintaining a healthy vaginal pH balance for women helps prevent unhealthy bacteria and yeast from multiplying too quickly and causing infection and discharge.

ELIMINATE ODOR, ITCHING OR IRRITATION - Soft foaming feminine wash for women effectively cleanses and moisturizes, leaving your private area smooth and supple. Keep your vaginal area hygienic and fresh after workout, during period or having frequent discharge.

NATURAL AND SAFE INGREDIENTS - Made without Sulfates, Parabens and other synthetic preservatives that can cause irritation and dryness, Fem intimate wash uses quality plant extracts for best results. Musk and floral scent. Made in Korea.

DIRECTIONS - Apply the foaming intimate wash to external areas and folds of the vagina. Gently massage to cleanse and rinse with water. Can be used daily during shower or bath. Also check out GENT Intimate Wash for Men.
body.description: fem Intimate Wash by Amaranth is about inner beauty. Unlike other areas, intimate areas are often neglected in cleanliness as they are normally not exposed. fem’s soft, non-irritating foam wash helps maintain hygiene and pH balance. ✅Gentle, naturally derived ingredients ✅No irritation on sensitive skin types ✅Formulated to match and maintain healthy vaginal pH ✅Eliminate odor, itching or irritation Specially formulated with natural ingredients like Eucalyptus leaf extract and Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Extract to safely cleanse the most intimate parts of woman’s body. Pump 2-3 times and apply. Gently massage to cleanse and rinse with water. Can be used daily. For external use only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the scent!
reviews.reviewText: Great feminine wash! The foam lather is soft and smells like walking in a garden on a spring day. I would love if they offered a body wash in the same fragrance as this is a little pricey to use all over. 10/10 would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great PH balancing feminine wash.
reviews.reviewText: Great PH balancing feminine wash. I bought this three months ago and been using it for every day.I really like this light weight foam, soft and gentle cleanser for my sensitive parts. It rinses off clean and easy with no residue. It has a very nice scent and keeps you fresh and clean feeling. Love it!!Strongly recommend this product as a simple, basic cleanser for women’s secret areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cumple con los resultados esperados, buen humectante

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Im really glad I came across this product! The smell is like fresh roses and doesn’t leave me feeling weird down there like other washes do ! The foam and other are perfect too! I hated getting crappy foam washes and the lather was awful. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh balanced gentle foam with the beautiful scent!
reviews.reviewText: I was searching ph balanced cleanser for a while and found this product. After a few days of try, I feel so much clean and balanced. The foam gives much gentle wash while it also provides the pleasant scent. I absolutely love the pink package, too!I tried few other products, but this is my favorite. Highly recommend 👌 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Not a big review person but this product deserves to be spotlighted and praised. While I bought the product a while back, I justly recently began to use the product faithfully. I'm pregnant and my pH has taken a few hits. Very soon after starting my regiment, I noticed a drastic change for the better. I am beyond pleased and thankful.

reviews.reviewText: This product is a life saver. It 100% works. I’ve used it for over 2 months and it’s great. I will buy this product over and over again. I use 1-2 pumps after every shower and haven’t had a problem since I started using it.
